name: sunith vs

top_projects.name: devb.io
top_projects.description: DevB.io seamlessly transforms your GitHub footprint into a living, breathing portfolio. Powered by AI, it tells your developer story while you focus on what matters most: writing great code. No more portfolio maintenance headaches, just pure coding brilliance on display.

top_projects.name: marine-science
top_projects.description: A Django-based web application for managing marine science conference registrations, abstract submissions, and payments. The system provides a complete solution for conference organization, including user authentication, payment processing, and content management.

top_projects.name: RideBook
top_projects.description: A Django-based ride-sharing platform API that implements core functionalities similar to Uber. This project provides a robust backend system for managing ride bookings, user authentication, and real-time ride tracking.

top_projects.name: youtube-video-summarisation
top_projects.description: A Django web application that generates concise summaries of YouTube videos using Natural Language Processing (NLP). The application extracts the transcript from YouTube videos and creates a summary highlighting the key points.

sunithvs/event-checkin.summary: The event-checkin repository has seen significant activity with multiple push events occurring on January 9th and 11th, primarily consisting of 'init' messages, indicating initial setup and development of the repository.

sunithvs/polls.summary: The polls repository experienced a series of push events on January 8th, with messages indicating that the base functionality is now working and some animations have been added, suggesting progress in enhancing the repository's features.

sunithvs/poll-flow.summary: The poll-flow repository saw updates on January 8th and 9th, including a push event to update the README.md file and another for a title change, indicating maintenance and refinement of the repository's content and structure.

sunithvs/devb.io.summary: The devb.io repository had a significant update on January 1st, addressing a profile card overflow bug through a pull request, which not only fixed the issue but also included detailed documentation of the changes, showcasing a thorough approach to resolving and documenting bugs.

sunithvs/chilav.summary: The chilav repository had a recent update on January 10th with the creation of a CNAME file, which is typically used for custom domain configuration, suggesting steps towards customizing or setting up the repository's web presence.

profile_summary: As a seasoned backend developer with a strong foundation in Python, C, and TypeScript, I leverage my technical expertise to build scalable and efficient solutions. With a professional network of over 100 followers and a portfolio of 97 public repositories, I'm committed to continuously delivering high-quality code and collaborating with like-minded individuals. As a CUSATian and engineer by profession, I'm passionate about pushing the boundaries of innovation, currently working at Eduport and showcasing my projects at devb.io/sunithvs.
